channel.title: Posts on My personal blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on My personal blog

item.title: Application Performance Elastic
item.description: On June 7, 2021, A Cloud Guru released a challenge about improving the performance of an application. After a very bumpy ride, I was able to complete this challenge. One of the things that made me work on this challenge was the need to learn terraform, so I found existing building the infrastructure of this project using terraform. Check it out! Let’s connect? Github LinkedIn My learnings When I started this challenge, there were a couple of things that I didn’t know about AWS and one of the reasons that made me work on this.
